title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When using StyledText and performing a text change with word wrap enabled, there is an issue with the redraw process that leads to inefficient redraws. This can result in multiple redraws for each visible line, causing performance issues when there are frequent text changes.
EB: This issue should be fixed so that there is at a maximum only one redraw for each visible line. To reproduce this issue, please run the test case provided below.
